name: Jerry Fawlter
description: Jerry Fawlteris a character mentioned inCyberpunk 2077and makes an appearance inPhantom Liberty. Prior to2076, Jerry Fawlter worked as the head ofdataterm's sales department. After the privatization of theNCPD, Fawlater was appointed as the new police commissioner. Ever since becoming a commissioner, Jerry involved himself in numerous illicit dealings. He conspired withMaelstromgang member, Aleksandra Zaytsova, to lure officer Reggie Loeb and his partner into an ambush for being too proactive in their investigations. He also organized the elimination of homeless people withScavengersmember...
